USER_CONTEXT: Fix astropy.io.ascii.write() formats parameter being ignored for HTML output format

- Identified HTML writer uses col.info.iter_str_vals() directly instead of str_vals() method that applies formatting
- Found core.py _get_writer function assigns formats to writer.data.formats (line 1727)

- Created reproduction script at /tmp/tmplnydgmuv/astropy/reproduce_issue.py
- Created test script at /tmp/tmplnydgmuv/astropy/test_html_formats.py
- Applied fix to HTML writer by adding self.data._set_col_formats() call after line 353
